string.name: Text00
string.value: - Introduction \r\n

string.name: Text01
string.value: This system is designed to enable users to make transactions with game items using Nexon Cash.

string.name: Text02
string.value: This system will ensure that both parties will make safe & secured transactions. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text03
string.value: - [For Sale] \r\n

string.name: Text04
string.value: 1. Selling an item : \r\n

string.name: Text05
string.value: Select the item to sell in the inventory at the bottom-left corner of the screen, and press Sell/Auction , then it'll be registered under the [For Sale] list.

string.name: Text06
string.value: When the item is registered, a registration fee (mesos) will be charged.

string.name: Text07
string.value: Please be aware that even if the item is later removed from the list, the registration fee will NOT be returned.

string.name: Text08
string.value: Also, once the item is listed under "For Sale", the item is deleted from your inventory,

string.name: Text09
string.value: and will not be available for use in the game. In order to use the item, remove the item from the For Sale list. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text10
string.value: 2. Purchasing an item on sale：\r\n

string.name: Text11
string.value: You may purchase the item by simply clicking [Wanted] on the item you'd like to buy.

string.name: Text12
string.value: Please check all the details on the item (item name, unit, price, option, etc.) before making the purchase. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text13
string.value: 3. Transaction Fee : \r\n

string.name: Text14
string.value: Once the item is registered for sale, the transaction fee of [500 Nexon Cash + 7% of the item price] will be added to the listed price.

string.name: Text15
string.value: After the item is sold, the difference between the registered price and the actual selling price will be construed as the transaction fee.

string.name: Text16
string.value: The fee will be given to the user that buys the item. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text17
string.value: 4. Cart：\r\n

string.name: Text18
string.value: If there are multiple items to purchase, you may store the items in the Shopping Cart,

string.name: Text19
string.value: The items stored in the shopping cart can be seen through the Cart button at My Page. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text20
string.value: - [Wanted] \r\n

string.name: Text21
string.value: 1. Add to Cart：\r\n

string.name: Text22
string.value: By clicking on this button, you can register an item you'd like to buy under [Wanted], and purchase the selected item owned by other users. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text23
string.value: 2. Transaction fee：\r\n

string.name: Text24
string.value: Once the item is added to the cart, the transaction fee of [500 Nexon Cash + 7% of the item price] will be added to the listed price.

string.name: Text25
string.value: After the item is bought, the difference between the registered price and the actual selling price will be construed as the transaction fee.

string.name: Text26
string.value: The price of purchase will be listed, minus the transaction fee. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text27
string.value: - [My Page] \r\n

string.name: Text28
string.value: 1. Cart：\r\n

string.name: Text29
string.value: You can see all the items in the cart, as well as items you've reserved, all in this list.

string.name: Text30
string.value: The cart will not be emptied out the moment you log out of the game. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text31
string.value: 2. Reserved Item \r\n

string.name: Text32
string.value: You can see the list of items that have been reserved.

string.name: Text33
string.value: If the item is up on the market by a user, you may head directly to that page and make the purchase. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text34
string.value: 3. History : \r\n

string.name: Text35
string.value: This is where you can check your history of transaction on MTS. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text36
string.value: 4. Auction Progress : \r\n

string.name: Text37
string.value: This is the place to check up on your progress in the auction. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text38
string.value: - Others \r\n

string.name: Text39
string.value: Editing the Registered Information：\r\n

string.name: Text40
string.value: Once the item has been registered for sale or to buy, the information cannot be edited.

string.name: Text41
string.value: To do so, please cancel the registration and re-register. \r\n\r\n
